sentences.sentence: The Lion and the Tiger
On a hot summer day when all the animals were thirsty, a lion and a tiger came at the same time to drink at a small water hole.
Each wanted to drink first, and soon they started fighting.
It was a terrible fight.
Both seriously injured and exhausted,
they stopped to catch their breath( 喘口气 ) and saw vultures( 秃鹫 ) overhead( 在头上方 ),
waiting to eat the body of whichever should fall first.
They made peace at once, saying,
“If we continue, the only ones who will gain( 获益 ) from our fight will be the vultures( 秃鹫 ).”
MORAL: If you no longer have a good reason for fighting, stop.
The Lioness
The animals were arguing about who deserved( 应得 ) the most praise for the babies she gave birth to( 生育 ).
They ran over to a lioness, and asked for her opinion.
“And you,” they said, “how many sons do you give birth to( 生育 )?”
The lioness laughed at( 嘲笑 ) them, and said, “I only have one, but what a big, wonderful animal he is!”
MORAL: Quality matters more than quantity( 数量 ).
The Lion in a Farmyard( 农家庭院 )
A lion entered a farmyard( 农家庭院 ).
The farmer, wishing to catch him, shut the gate.
When the lion found that he could not get out, he attacked the sheep and killed them.
The farmer, beginning to fear for his own safety, opened the gate and let the lion out.
After he left, the farmer was sad at the loss of his sheep.
His wife, however, who had seen everything that had happened, said,
“You deserve( 应得 ) this. How could you for a moment think of shutting a lion in here, when you know that you get afraid if you only hear him from a distance?'
MORAL: Better scare( 吓跑 ) a thief( 小偷 ) than actually( 事实上 ) catch him.
The Lion in Love
A lion wanted to marry the daughter of a man.
The father, who didn’t want to agree but was afraid to refuse, had an idea.
He said he would accept only if the lion would allow the man to take out the lion’s teeth and claws( 爪子 ).
The lion agreed to this plan, but when he next asked to marry her, the man no longer had reason to fear the lion and beat him off( 击退 ).
MORAL: Love can blind even the wildest.
The Lion’s Share
A lion once went hunting( 捕猎 ) with a fox( 狐狸 ), a jackal( 豺 ), and a wolf( 狼 ).
They hunted( 捕猎 ) and hunted( 捕猎 ) until at last they found a stag( 雄鹿 ), and soon killed it.
Then came the question of how the food should be shared.
“Cut this stag( 雄鹿 ) into four pieces,” said the lion.
The other animals then cut it into four parts.
The lion stood in front of the pieces and decided,
“The first quarter is for me as I am king of the animals; the second is mine as judge( 裁判 );
another share comes to me for my part in the chase( 打猎 ); as for the fourth quarter, well, I should like to see which of you will dare( 敢 ) to try and take it.”
MORAL: You may share the work of the great, but you will not share the rewards( 报酬 ).

question.cn: 在故事The Lion and the Tiger中，为什么狮子会和老虎打架？
question.en: Why did the lion fight with the tiger in the story The Lion and the Tiger?

analysis: 文中提到：“A lion and a tiger came at the same time to drink at a small water hole. Each wanted to drink first, and soon they started fighting.”可知老虎和狮子为了谁能第一个喝水而打架，因此选A。

question.cn: 在故事The Lion in a Farmyard中，为什么农夫会将狮子关在院子里？
question.en: In the story the Lion in a Farmyard, why did the farmer shut the lion in his farmyard?

options.en: He wished to catch the lion.
He was scared of the lion.

options.cn: 他的妻子想要杀死狮子。
options.en: His wife wanted to kill the lion.

analysis: 文中提到：“The farmer, wishing to catch him, shut the gate.”可知，农夫把狮子关在家里的目的是抓捕狮子，因此选A。

question.cn: 在故事The Lion in a Farmyard中，农夫在庭院里杀掉狮子了吗？
question.en: In the story The Lion in a Farmyard, did the farmer kill the lion in his farmyard?

analysis: 文中提到：“The farmer, beginning to fear for his own safety, opened the gate and let the lion out.”可知，最后农夫因为害怕放走了狮子，因此选B。

question.cn: 在故事 The Lion in Love中，狮子娶到了男人的女儿吗？
question.en: In the story the Lion in Love, did the lion marry the daughter of the man?

analysis: 文中提到：“The man no longer had reason to fear the lion and beat him off.”可知，失去爪子和牙齿的狮子被男人打出门，所以狮子并没有娶到男人的女儿，因此选B。

question.cn: 在故事The Lion's Share中，狩猎团队捕到了什么？
question.en: In the story the Lion's Share, what did the hunting group find?

analysis: 文中提到：“They hunted and hunted until at last they found a stag.”他们捕捉到了一头鹿，因此选B。
